downloadTitle: Security Update for Windows Embedded POSReady 7 USB Boot system (KB2862330)
downloadDescription: A security issue has been identified in a Microsoft software product that could affect your system.
detailsSection:
A security issue has been identified in a Microsoft software product that could affect your system. You can help protect your system by installing this update from Microsoft. For a complete listing of the issues that are included in this update, see the associated Microsoft Knowledge Base article. After you install this update, you may have to restart your system.
Original Date Published: 10/7/2013
installInstructionSection:
• Click Run to start the installation immediately.
  • Click Save to copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time.

This update must be installed by executing the appropriate msu file on a POSReady7 image.

relatedResourcesSection.title: windows Embedded Standard 7 x64 USB Boot
